text: Attack from the Sea () is a 1953 Soviet war drama movie directed by Mikhail Romm.Фильм-победитель "Дубль Дв@" покажут по ТВКорабли штурмуют бастионы (1953) The movie is about the career of the Russian naval officer Fyodor Ushakov and the Siege of Corfu (1798–99). It stars Ivan Pereverzev, Gennadi Yudin, and Vladimir Druzhnikov. ==Actors== * Ivan Pereverzev as Adm. Fedor Fedorovich Ushakov * Gennadi Yudin as Capt. Dmitri Nikolayevich Senyavin * Vladimir Druzhnikov as Capt. Vasilyev * Aleksey Alekseev as Capt. Yegor Metaksa * Sergei Bondarchuk as Tikhon Alexeyevich Prokofiev == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1953 war movies Category:1953 drama movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm
title: Attack from the Sea
